title: Plate, ""Asiatic Plants"", mid-19th century
markings: On underside: blue transfer-printed decoration of flowering branch with long leaves; "Asiatic" printed on one leaf "Plants" printed on another.
dimensions: 3 h. x 27 diameter cm (1 3/16 x 10 5/8 in. )
description: Scalloped-edge plate with blue transfer-printed decoration on white ground. Central image of branches with blossoming flowers and foliage. Border with dense flower motifs, flower swags and other decorative patterns.

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, ""Asiatic Plants"", mid-19th century.
mid-19th century. Earthenware, transfer-printed decoration. Gift of Paul F. Walter. 2001-25-13.
